cause.description:
Many ppl just don't know how to find the similarities of the "cool" ppl and the "not-cool" ppl... We have to end this now, or we won't get along as well.
1. Equality in high school.
2. To Respect ppl, no matter who they are.
3. To try NOT to bully others.
cause.mission: stop the gap between the "cool" ppl and the "not-cool" ppl.
cause.name: End the Popular Status
